layout.title: AI Receptionist | 24/7 Phone Answering Service
layout.description: Never miss a call again with our AI receptionist. Answers calls 24/7, books appointments, answers questions, and sounds completely human. Perfect for spas and massage businesses.

hero.title: Never Miss Another Call Again
hero.text: Our AI receptionist answers every call in seconds, books appointments, answers questions, and sounds completely human. Available 24/7, even when you're fully booked or closed. No training required, no sick days, no holidays.

services.title: Your Customers Don't Care That You're Busy
services.text: When someone calls and gets voicemail, they hang up and call your competitor. Our AI receptionist answers every single call instantly, books them in, and keeps your calendar full - even at 2am on a Sunday.

items.title: Answers Every Call Instantly
items.text: No more voicemail, no more missed calls. Every caller gets a human-sounding response in seconds, whether it's 3pm on Tuesday or 11pm on Saturday.

items.title: Books Appointments While You Sleep
items.text: Callers can book appointments directly over the phone. The AI checks your real-time availability, books them in, and sends confirmations - all automatically.

items.title: Sounds Completely Human
items.text: Natural conversation, proper pronunciation, understanding of context. Your callers won't know they're talking to AI - they'll just think you have amazing customer service.

reviews.title: How AI Receptionist Changed These Businesses

items.text: We were losing 30-40 calls per week to voicemail. Now every single call is answered instantly, and we're booking 20+ extra appointments per month. The AI sounds so natural, clients are amazed when I tell them it's not a real person.
items.name: Rachel Stevens
items.title: Owner, Bliss Thai Massage

items.text: Best investment we've ever made. The AI handles all our calls professionally, books appointments accurately, and works 24/7. Our revenue has increased by 25% just from not missing calls anymore. It's like having a perfect receptionist who never takes a break.
items.name: Tom Williams
items.title: Manager, Harmony Spa & Wellness

features.title: More Than Just Answering - It's Your Perfect Receptionist
features.text: Our AI receptionist doesn't just pick up the phone - it understands your business, knows your services, and handles conversations like a trained professional who's worked with you for years.

items.title: 24/7 Availability
items.text: Never miss a call again. Answers instantly at 2am, during holidays, when you're with clients, or when all your lines are busy.

items.title: Appointment Booking
items.text: Books appointments directly over the phone by checking your real-time availability. Customers don't need to call back or go online.

items.title: Answers Common Questions
items.text: Trained on your services, prices, location, and hours. Answers customer questions accurately and professionally without bothering your staff.

items.title: Natural Conversations
items.text: Understands context, accents, and natural speech patterns. Handles interruptions, clarifications, and complex requests just like a human would.

items.title: Instant Call Summaries
items.text: Every call is transcribed and summarised. You get notifications with what was discussed and any actions needed - no more scribbled notes.

items.title: Multiple Languages
items.text: Can speak English, Thai, and other languages fluently. Automatically detects the caller's language and responds appropriately.
